div.p: This case-insensitive code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/BinetStagingSystem defines the following codes:

tr.td: Stage A: <3 areas of lymphadenopathy*, and normal hemoglobin and platelet count
≥3 areas of lymphadenopathy*, and normal hemoglobin and platelet count
Anemia (Hgb <10 g/dL) and/or thrombocytopenia (platelets <100,000/mm³), regardless of number of areas of lymphadenopathy
